backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing implemented features, referenced files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files and their roles in routing, audio, UI, and assets.
frontend/cleanup-notes-non-frontend.md: Notes on non-frontend files considered for cleanup, mainly evaluating feature_evidence.json for potential deletion.
frontend/cleanup-report.md: Report listing unused frontend assets and components removed during cleanup and the required files retained.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining CSS variables, color tokens, and base theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/README-assets.md: Documentation for background images and the background‑music.mp3 asset, including behavior, playback rules, and diagnostics.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry that sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps them with the error boundary and background audio provider.
frontend/src/assets/staticAssets.ts: Exports paths for the three background images used on the intro, proposal, and final pages.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary displaying a fallback UI and allowing page refresh on runtime errors.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundAudioP: Context provider managing background music playback, gesture fallback, mute controls, local file selection, and audio diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/CornerAudioPicke: Provides a floating button to select a local audio file, validates it, and displays status and filename.
frontend/src/components/EnterWebsiteGate: Shows an entry gate screen with animations and triggers audio playback on user gesture before revealing children.
frontend/src/components/FullscreenBackgr: Wraps content with a full-screen background image using contain scaling and a dark overlay.
frontend/src/components/RomanticButton.t: A styled romantic-themed button component with adjustable size.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Basic layout that renders the current route via Outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom color variables, fonts, and animations for hearts, fades, and shimmer effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/FinalPage.tsx: Displays the final message page with scrollable romantic text over a full-screen background.
frontend/src/pages/IntroPage.tsx: Intro page with timed CTA, background image, and entry gate before navigating to the proposal page.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalPage.tsx: Proposal page showing a marriage question and a YES button that navigates to the final page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, fonts, radii, and custom animations with dark mode and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing default music-track behavior, song picker relocation, and pending feature requests for a music player site.
